concept.description: Determines the current branch by evaluating the HEAD ref and sets a label "Current".
concept.cypher: MATCH (repository:Git:Repository), (repository)-[:HAS_HEAD]->(head:Git:Commit), (repository)-[:HAS_BRANCH]->(branch:Git:Branch)-[:HAS_HEAD]->(branchHead:Git:Commit), p=shortestPath((branchHead)-[:HAS_PARENT*0..]->(head)) SET branch:Current RETURN branch.name as CurrentBranch, length(p) as Offset

concept.description: Determines all commits with more than one parent commit and sets a label "Merge".
concept.cypher: MATCH (mergeCommit:Git:Commit)-[:HAS_PARENT]->(parent:Git:Commit) WITH mergeCommit, collect(parent) as parents WHERE size(parents) > 1 SET mergeCommit:Merge RETURN count(mergeCommit) as MergeCommits
